name: Royal Garden Tales
description:
Join Amelia and her friendly fairy, Lulu – to beat FUN and entertaining, yet challenging match 3 levels, which will allow you to restore, rebuild, and decorate the Royal Garden, just like it was in its former glory!

Give the Royal Garden castle mansion a complete makeover. Show off your designer skills by planting trees, shrubs, flowers, and many more. Thousands of design options will give you freedom to explore your imagination, change designs any time you want, and create your Royal Garden dream!

ROYAL GARDEN HIGHLIGHTS

• PLAY hundreds of fun and challenging match-3 levels!
• EARN as many Coins as you can and Fairy Dust to perform magic.
• RESTORE and decorate the scenery of your Royal Garden.
• MEET various and interesting royal characters.
• MAGICAL story and journey for you to unfold.

Play Royal Garden Tales for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. Download and play our match 3 decoration puzzle game – we hope that you like it. ^^ We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at: support@touchten.com

Like Us on Facebook! http://fb.me/RoyalGardenTales
